snippet: After Ivan Nova allowed two runs in seven innings, Dave Robertson loaded the bases in the ninth but escaped the jam to cap a 5-3 victory over the Rays.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Tampa Bay Rays, 5-3; Yankees closer Dave Robertson, who is replacing injured Mariano Rivera, earns his first save of the season.
lead_paragraph: After Ivan Nova allowed two runs in seven innings, Dave Robertson loaded the bases in the ninth but escaped the jam to cap a 5-3 victory over the Rays.

headline.seo: In First Post-Rivera Test, Dave Robertson Saves It for Yankees
headline.main: Heir to Rivera Hangs on to Pass His First Test
headline.print_headline: Heir to Rivera Hangs On to Pass His First Test
